metadata.title: La industria del ladrillo y la urbanización de San Cristóbal, 1910-1940
metadata.journal_or_publisher: Anuario Colombiano de Historia Social y de la Cultura

relevance.topic: The relationship between the brick industry and urbanization in San Cristóbal, Bogotá, during the early 20th century.
relevance.relevance: The study is relevant as it explores the impact of technological advancements in brick production on urbanization and labor dynamics in Bogotá.

design.sample_characteristics: The study focuses on the southeastern sector of Bogotá, specifically San Cristóbal, during the early 20th century.

text_fragments: The existence of both modern brick factories and artisanal producers had a concrete influence on the urbanization process in that part of the city.
qualitative_data.narrative_descriptions: The study describes the coexistence of modern and artisanal brick production in San Cristóbal and its impact on urbanization.

historical_context.economic_conditions: Period of urban growth in Bogotá during the early 20th century.
historical_context.institutional_context: Limited state intervention in urban planning; private urban developers played a significant role.

outcomes.main_findings: The brick industry, both modern and artisanal, played a significant role in the urbanization of San Cristóbal, contributing to the development of worker neighborhoods.
outcomes.conclusions: The study concludes that the brick industry was crucial in shaping the urban landscape of southeastern Bogotá, with modern factories and artisanal production coexisting and influencing urban growth.

quality_assessment.methodological_limitations: The study relies heavily on historical documents and may lack quantitative data to support some claims.
quality_assessment.coherence: The study provides a coherent narrative of the historical development of the brick industry and its impact on urbanization.
quality_assessment.adequacy_of_data: The study uses a variety of historical sources, including censuses and construction licenses, to support its findings.
quality_assessment.relevance: The study is relevant to understanding the historical impact of industrialization on urban development and labor dynamics.
